ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer
1 (18 ounce) bottle your favorite barbecue sauce
8 hamburger buns, split and lightly toasted

cookingTips: Use root beer for a subtle sweetness and complexity that complements pork naturally
Cook on low for 4-6 hours with tenderloin to prevent drying out
Lightly toast buns to prevent them from becoming soggy from pulled pork juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through creating a quick, unexpectedly delicious pulled pork using root beer as a secret ingredient.
